Artificial Intelligence Auditing Framework

The document provides an overview of the IIA's Artificial Intelligence Auditing Framework, covering its structure and content. It outlines the framework's components, including an introduction, four parts, a practitioner's guide, and a glossary. The framework aims to provide a structured approach to auditing AI systems, ensuring they are transparent, accountable, and secure.

Key Concepts:

  • AI Auditing Framework
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Intellectual Processes
  • Limited Memory AI
  • Chatbots
  • Supervised Learning
  • Understanding user access to AI-reliant data
  • Ensuring appropriate access to IT resources
  • Protecting systems from unauthorized users
  • Organizational cyber resilience capabilities
